titleStmt.title: A students lamentation that hath sometime been in London an apprentice for the rebellious tumults lately in the citie hapning: for which fiue suffred death on Thursday the 24. of Iuly last.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An admonition to all prentises.
Identified as STC 23401a on UMI microfilm.
Title page cropped at foot, with some loss of imprint (publication date from STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
